sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_6c3a8c011b89c1103351ca2b234bcbf0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition>gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName() && gs.getUserName() != "system" && (new ScriptConditionsHelper().sirUpdateStateCheck(current)) == true</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="task">stateVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>[SIR] Update State in Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions>x_ibmrt_resilient.user</role_conditions><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {
	
	var workflowId = null;
	
	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)
	var wf = new global.Workflow();
	
	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_UpdateState");
	
	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(workflowId == null){
		workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_UpdateState");
	}

	//Start the workflow, where 'current' is the current record the UI action was triggered from
	wf.startFlow(workflowId, current, null, null);

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-12 16:12:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6c3a8c011b89c1103351ca2b234bcbf0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[SIR] Update State in Resilient</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6c3a8c011b89c1103351ca2b234bcbf0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-02 16:23:56</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6c3a8c011b89c1103351ca2b234bcbf0"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_581aee23dbf76f009106f4331f9619f8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.isValidField("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") && current.getValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") != null && gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName() && gs.getUserName() != "system"</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">work_notesVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>[INC] Add Work Note to Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions>x_ibmrt_resilient.user</role_conditions><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {
	
	var workflowId = null;
	
	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)
	var wf = new global.Workflow();
	
	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_AddWorkNote");
	
	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(workflowId == null){
		workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_AddWorkNote");
	}

	//Start the workflow, where 'current' is the current record the UI action was triggered from
	wf.startFlow(workflowId, current, null, null);

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>integration_developer</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-01 13:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>581aee23dbf76f009106f4331f9619f8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[INC] Add Work Note to Resilient</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_581aee23dbf76f009106f4331f9619f8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-14 18:35:21</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=581aee23dbf76f009106f4331f9619f8"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_e61dfadfdbb3af008c5d785e0f96199f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri>/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/api/get_sys_id</default_operation_uri><enforce_acl>0616105ddb00b3408c5d785e0f9619a0</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>get_sys_id</name><operation_script><![CDATA[// (c) Copyright IBM Corp. 2019. All Rights Reserved.

// Script that runs for the following endpoint:: 
// https://service-now-host.com/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/api/get_sys_id

(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	var snowHelper, params, tableName, record, errMsg = null;

	//Instantiate new SNOWRESTHelper
	snowHelper = new SNOWRESTHelper();

	//Get the params from the request
	params = request.queryParams;

	//Get the tableName
	tableName = params.sn_table_name;

	//If the table is allowed to be accessed, continue
	if(snowHelper.tableIsAllowed(tableName)){
		record = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		record.addQuery(params.sn_query_field, params.sn_query_value);
		record.query();
		record.next();
	
		response.setBody({
			"sys_id": record.getValue("sys_id")
		});

		return response;
	}
	//Else return an error
	else{
		errMsg = "Do not have permission to access the table '"+tableName+"'. It needs to be included in the ServiceNowAllowedTables CSV list.";
		return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError(errMsg);
	}

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/v1/api/get_sys_id</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/get_sys_id</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>integration_developer</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-28 20:38:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>e61dfadfdbb3af008c5d785e0f96199f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>get_sys_id</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_e61dfadfdbb3af008c5d785e0f96199f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-21 12:11:44</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="api">4858b21fdbb3af008c5d785e0f9619fa</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">6688761fdbb3af008c5d785e0f961926</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_095e8cc11b89c1103351ca2b234bcb2c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition>gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName() && gs.getUserName() != "system" && (new ScriptConditionsHelper().sirAddWorkNoteCheck(current)) == true</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="task">work_notesVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>[SIR] Add Work Note to Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions>x_ibmrt_resilient.user</role_conditions><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {
	
	var workflowId = null;
	
	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)
	var wf = new global.Workflow();
	
	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_AddWorkNote");
	
	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(workflowId == null){
		workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_AddWorkNote");
	}

	//Start the workflow, where 'current' is the current record the UI action was triggered from
	wf.startFlow(workflowId, current, null, null);

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-12 16:24:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>095e8cc11b89c1103351ca2b234bcb2c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[SIR] Add Work Note to Resilient</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_095e8cc11b89c1103351ca2b234bcb2c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-02 16:23:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=095e8cc11b89c1103351ca2b234bcb2c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ab56729bdbb3af008c5d785e0f961959
sys_update_xml.payload: package_privatetruex_ibmrt_resilient.ResilientHelperfalseA class to help use the ResilientAPI. This class will ensure that 'required fields' get set, in order for the whole integration to work correctly. sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_7104cfdfdbb3af008c5d785e0f96197d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri>/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/api/update</default_operation_uri><enforce_acl>0616105ddb00b3408c5d785e0f9619a0</enforce_acl><http_method>PATCH</http_method><name>update</name><operation_script><![CDATA[// (c) Copyright IBM Corp. 2019. All Rights Reserved.

// Script that runs for the following endpoint:: 
// https://service-now-host.com/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/api/update


(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	
	//Declare global variables
	var snowHelper, params, tableName, record, responseBody, i, fields, field, errMsg = null;
	
	//Instantiate new SNOWRESTHelper
	snowHelper = new SNOWRESTHelper();

	//Get the params from the request (because its a PATCH we use request body)
	params = request.body.data;

	//Initialize responseBody to empty object
	responseBody = {};

	//Get the tableName
	tableName = params.sn_table_name;

	//If the table is allowed to be accessed, continue
	if(snowHelper.tableIsAllowed(tableName)){

		//Initialize a new record
		record = new GlideRecord(tableName);

		//Get the record using sn_ref_id
		record.addQuery("number", params.sn_ref_id);
		record.query();
		record.next();

		// If record not found, return an error
		if(!record.isValid()){
			errMsg = "Could not find a ServiceNow Record with Number: " + params.sn_ref_id + " in table: " + tableName;
			return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError(errMsg);
		}

		//Get the fields to update
		fields = params.sn_update_fields;

		//Loop the fields. Each field has a 'name' and 'value' key
		for (i = 0 ; i < fields.length; i++){
			field = fields[i];

			//If the field is valid, update its value
			if(record.isValidField(field.name)){
				record[field.name] = field.value;
				record.setValue(field.name, field.value);
			}
			else{
				gs.warn(field.name + " is not a valid field in the " + tableName + " table!");
			}
		}

		//Update the record
		record.update();
		
		//Set and return the response
		responseBody["sn_ref_id"] = params.sn_ref_id;	
		response.setBody(responseBody);
		return response;
	}
	else{
		errMsg = "Do not have permission to access the table '"+tableName+"'. It needs to be included in the ServiceNowAllowedTables CSV list.";
		return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError(errMsg);
	}

})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/v1/api/update</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/update</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>integration_developer</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-28 21:08:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>7104cfdfdbb3af008c5d785e0f96197d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>update</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_7104cfdfdbb3af008c5d785e0f96197d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-12 21:15:36</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="api">4858b21fdbb3af008c5d785e0f9619fa</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">6688761fdbb3af008c5d785e0f961926</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fe91b2e3dbf76f009106f4331f961942
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.isValidField("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") && current.getValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") != null && gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName() && gs.getUserName() != "system"</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">commentsVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>[INC] Add Comment to Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions>x_ibmrt_resilient.user</role_conditions><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {
	
	var workflowId = null;
	
	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)	
	var wf = new global.Workflow();

	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_AddComment");
	
	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(workflowId == null){
		workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_AddComment");
	}
	
	//Start the workflow, where 'current' is the current record the UI action was triggered from
	wf.startFlow(workflowId, current, null, null);

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>integration_developer</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-01 14:27:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fe91b2e3dbf76f009106f4331f961942</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[INC] Add Comment to Resilient</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fe91b2e3dbf76f009106f4331f961942</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-14 18:35:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fe91b2e3dbf76f009106f4331f961942"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_51e97ced1b1d01503351ca2b234bcb39
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_attachment</collection><condition>gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName() && gs.getUserName() != "system"</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_attachment">table_name!=x_ibmrt_resilient_tempattachments^EQ<item endquery="false" field="table_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="x_ibmrt_resilient_tempattachments"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Add Attachment to Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {

	var workflowId = null;
	
	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)
	var wf = new global.Workflow();
	
	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_UploadAttachment");
	
	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(workflowId == null){
		workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_UploadAttachment");
	}

	//Start the workflow, where 'current' is the current record the UI action was triggered from
	wf.startFlow(workflowId, current, null, null);

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-26 19:06:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>51e97ced1b1d01503351ca2b234bcb39</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add Attachment to Resilient</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_51e97ced1b1d01503351ca2b234bcb39</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-28 16:21:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=51e97ced1b1d01503351ca2b234bcb39"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri>/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/api/create</default_operation_uri><enforce_acl>0616105ddb00b3408c5d785e0f9619a0</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>create</name><operation_script><![CDATA[// (c) Copyright IBM Corp. 2022. All Rights Reserved.

(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	
	//Declare global variables
	var snowHelper, params, tableName, record, responseBody, errMsg= null;
	
	//Instantiate new SNOWRESTHelper
	snowHelper = new SNOWRESTHelper();

	//Get the params from the request (because its a POST we use request body)
	params = request.body.data;

	//Get the tableName
	tableName = params.sn_table_name;

	//Function that creates and initializes a new GlideRecord
	function newRecord(tableName){
		var rec = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		rec.initialize();
		return rec;
	}

	//Function that generates the response body
	function generateResponseBody(record){
		return {
			"res_id": params.id,
			"sn_sys_id": record.getValue('sys_id'),
			"sn_ref_id": record.getValue('number'),
			"sn_state": record.state.getChoiceValue()
		};
	}
	
	//Function to set all common table column fields
	function setRecordRequiredFields(record, params, type, short_description, description){
		//Set custom table column fields
		if (record.isValidField("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id")) {
			record.setValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id", params.id);
			record.setValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_type", type);
			record.setValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_link", params.link);
		} else {
			record.setValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_soar_reference_id", params.id);
			record.setValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_soar_type", type);
			record.setValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_soar_reference_link", params.link);
		}
		
		//Set system table column fields
		record.short_description = short_description;
		record.description = description;
		
		//If an initial work note is defined, add it
		if(params.sn_init_work_note != null){
			record.work_notes = params.sn_init_work_note;
		}
		
		return record;
	}

	//Function that sets the optional_fields of the record
	function setRecordOptionalFields(record, fields, tableName){
		for (var i=0; i<fields.length; i++){
			var field = fields[i];
			if(record.isValidField(field.name)){
				record[field.name] = field.value;
				record.setValue(field.name, field.value);
			}
			else{
				gs.warn(field.name + " is not a valid field in the " + tableName + " table!");
			}
		}
	}
	
	//If the table is allowed to be accessed, continue
	if(snowHelper.tableIsAllowed(tableName)){
		//Initialize a new record
		record = newRecord(tableName);
		
		//Create a ServiceNow record in if it is a Resilient Task
		if(params.type == 'res_task'){	
			//Set the required fields of the record
			record = setRecordRequiredFields(record, params, 'Task', params.task_name, params.task_instructions);
		}
		else if (params.type == 'res_incident'){
			//Set the required fields of the record
			record = setRecordRequiredFields(record, params, 'Incident', params.incident_name, params.incident_description);
		}
		else {
			errMsg = 'The Resilient Type must be defined and valid. Either "res_task" or "res_incident". Current value: ' + params.type;
			return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError(errMsg);
		}
		
		//Set the optional_fields that the user defines in the Resilient pre-process script
		if(params.sn_optional_fields){
			setRecordOptionalFields(record, params.sn_optional_fields, tableName);
		}

		//Insert the record
		record.insert();

		//Create the response body
		responseBody = generateResponseBody(record);
		response.setBody(responseBody);
		
		return response;
	}
	//Else return an error
	else{
		errMsg = "Do not have permission to access the table '"+tableName+"'. It needs to be included in the ServiceNowAllowedTables CSV list.";
		return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError(errMsg);
	}

})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/v1/api/create</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/create</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>integration_developer</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-28 20:30:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>d22bfa5fdbb3af008c5d785e0f9619df</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>create</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_d22bfa5fdbb3af008c5d785e0f9619df</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-31 19:29:19</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="api">4858b21fdbb3af008c5d785e0f9619fa</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">6688761fdbb3af008c5d785e0f961926</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_9018dd351b9941503351ca2b234bcb8b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_ibmrt_resilient.MultipartHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>A helper class for outbound multipart form-data POSTS</description><name>MultipartHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var MultipartHelper = Class.create();
MultipartHelper.prototype = {
	
	// these store the attachment we're tryign to format as a multipart request.
	attachmentId: null,
	attachmentGR: null,
	
	// the host record is where the temporary attachment is stored after it's recieved from the loopback API
	grHostRecord: null,
	
	// this is the ID of the "multipart" attachment that should be included in outgoing POST.
	bodyAttachmentId: null,
	
	initialize: function() {
		this.boundaryId = this._getBoundaryId();
		
	},
	
	// We need a record to link the temporary attachment to.
	// (Default is the the sys_user record of the calling user)
	// For Unifi this is likely to be the HTTPRequest record
	setHostRecord: function(grHostRecord) {
		this.grHostRecord = grHostRecord;
	},
	// Alternatively, we could call setHostDetails( table_name, sys_id )
	setHostDetails: function(hostTable, hostSysId) {
		var grHostRecord = new GlideRecord(hostTable);
		if (grHostRecord.get(hostSysId)) {
			this.grHostRecord = grHostRecord;
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	},
	
	// When adding an attachment we need to specify two or three things
	// - the name of the form field that the target is expecting
	// - the sys_id of the attachment to add
	addAttachment: function(formName, attachmentId) {
		
		this.formName = formName;
		this.attachmentId = attachmentId;
		
		this.attachmentGR = this._getAttachmentGR(this.attachmentId);
		if (this.attachmentGR) {
			
			this.attachmentName = this.attachmentGR.file_name.toString();
			
			return true;
		}
		
		return false;
	},
	
	// Generate the temporary attachment
	createBody: function(fileName, contentType, resilientAPI) {
		
		
		// make sure we have already looked up the attachment
		if (!this.attachmentGR) {
			return false;
		}
		
		// generate a message to the loopback api
		var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();

		// if (resilientAPI.midServerName) {
		// 	validateMidServer(resilientAPI.midServerName);
		// 	request.setMIDServer(resilientAPI.midServerName);
		// 	request.setEccParameter("skip_sensor", true);
		// }
		
		request.setEndpoint(gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + '/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/v1/api/multipart_helper'); //---> Use scripted API endpoint 
		
		request.setHttpMethod('GET');
		
		// request.setBasicAuth('username', 'password'); //------------> provide your authentication here
		
		request.setRequestHeader("Accept", "multipart/form-data");
		
		// set the metadata for what should be included
		request.setQueryParameter('attachment_id', this.attachmentId);
		request.setQueryParameter('boundary_id', this.boundaryId);
		request.setQueryParameter('form_name', this.formName);
		request.setQueryParameter('file_name', fileName);
		request.setQueryParameter('content_type', contentType);
		
		// we write the response back into an attachment
		request.saveResponseBodyAsAttachment(this.grHostRecord.getTableName(), this.grHostRecord.sys_id, this.attachmentName);
		
		var response = request.execute();

		response.waitForResponse(240);
		
		
		
		
		// only continue if the result was 200
		if (response.getStatusCode() == 200) {
			this.bodyAttachmentId = response.getResponseAttachmentSysid();
		} else {
			throw "Failed to create temporary attachment for file";
		}
	},
	
	// getContentType returns the content-type string including the boundary
	// e.g. multipart/form-data; boundary="xxxxxxxxxxxx"
	getContentType: function() {
		return 'multipart/form-data; boundary=' + this.boundaryId;
	},
	
	// getBodyId returns the sys_id of the multipart attachment
	getBodyId: function() {
		return this.bodyAttachmentId;
	},
	
	// Once we have sent the body we can delete the temporary attachment
	deleteBody: function() {
		var attachment = new GlideSysAttachment();
		attachment.deleteAttachment(this.bodyAttachmentId);
	},
	
	
	///// UTIL FUNCTIONS
	
	_getBoundaryId: function() {
		
		var text = "";
		var possible = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
		
		for (var i = 0; i < 8; i++)
			text += possible.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * possible.length));
		
		return text;
		
		
	},
	
	_getAttachmentGR: function(attachmentSysId) {
		var grSysAttachment = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
		if (grSysAttachment.get(attachmentSysId)) {
			
			return grSysAttachment;
			
		}
		return false;
	},
	
	type: 'MultipartHelper'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-27 16:55:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>9018dd351b9941503351ca2b234bcb8b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MultipartHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9018dd351b9941503351ca2b234bcb8b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-28 16:22:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_5143cbdfdbb3af008c5d785e0f961919
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri>/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/api/close_record</default_operation_uri><enforce_acl>0616105ddb00b3408c5d785e0f9619a0</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>close_record</name><operation_script><![CDATA[// (c) Copyright IBM Corp. 2019. All Rights Reserved.

// Script that runs for the following endpoint:: 
// https://service-now-host.com/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/api/close_record

(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	//Declare global variables
	var snowHelper, params, tableName, record, responseBody, errMsg = null;

	//Function that generates the response body
	function generateResponseBody(record){
		return {
			"sn_ref_id": params.sn_ref_id,
			"sn_state": record.state.getChoiceValue()
		};
	}

	//Instantiate new SNOWRESTHelper
	snowHelper = new SNOWRESTHelper();

	//Get the params from the request (because its a POST we use request body)
	params = request.body.data;

	//Get the tableName
	tableName = params.sn_table_name;
	
	//If the table is allowed to be accessed, continue
	if(snowHelper.tableIsAllowed(tableName)){

		//Initialize a new record
		record = new GlideRecord(tableName);

		//Get the record using sn_ref_id
		record.addQuery("number", params.sn_ref_id);
		record.query();
		record.next();

		//Only update if the sn_record_state is different to the records current state
		if(params.sn_record_state != record.state){
			
			//Set the attributes required to close a record
			record.close_notes = params.sn_close_notes;
			record.close_code = params.sn_close_code;
			record.state = params.sn_record_state;

			//If a close work_note is defined, add it
			if(params.sn_close_work_note != null){
				record.work_notes = params.sn_close_work_note;
			}

			//Update the record
			record.update();
			
			//Set and return the response
			response.setBody(generateResponseBody(record));
			return response;

		}
		else{
			errMsg = params.sn_ref_id + " state is already " + record.state + ". Cannot update the record.";
			return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError(errMsg);
		}
	}
	else{
		errMsg = "Do not have permission to access the table '"+tableName+"'. It needs to be included in the ServiceNowAllowedTables CSV list.";
		return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError(errMsg);
	}

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/v1/api/close_record</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/close_record</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>integration_developer</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-28 21:07:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>5143cbdfdbb3af008c5d785e0f961919</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>close_record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_5143cbdfdbb3af008c5d785e0f961919</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-21 15:43:13</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="api">4858b21fdbb3af008c5d785e0f9619fa</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">6688761fdbb3af008c5d785e0f961926</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sm_task</collection><condition>current.isValidField("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") && current.getValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") != null && gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName() && gs.getUserName() != "system"</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sm_task">commentsVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>[SIT] Add Comment to Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {
	
	var workflowId = null;
	
	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)	
	var wf = new global.Workflow();

	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_AddComment");
	
	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(workflowId == null){
		workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_AddComment");
	}
	
	//Start the workflow, where 'current' is the current record the UI action was triggered from
	wf.startFlow(workflowId, current, null, null);

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-19 19:21:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>94d9789f1b8d49103351ca2b234bcb0f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[SIT] Add Comment to Resilient</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Resilient" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_94d9789f1b8d49103351ca2b234bcb0f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 13:23:09</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=94d9789f1b8d49103351ca2b234bcb0f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_699a38531bcd49103351ca2b234bcb1d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sm_task</collection><condition>current.isValidField("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") && current.getValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") != null && gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName() && gs.getUserName() != "system"</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sm_task">work_notesVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>[SIT] Add Work Note to Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {
	
	var workflowId = null;
	
	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)
	var wf = new global.Workflow();
	
	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_AddWorkNote");
	
	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(workflowId == null){
		workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_AddWorkNote");
	}

	//Start the workflow, where 'current' is the current record the UI action was triggered from
	wf.startFlow(workflowId, current, null, null);

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_8801379b1b1501103351ca2b234bcb23
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_ibmrt_resilient.ScriptConditionsHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Script Include full of conditions useful for writing long conditions in Business Rules</description><name>ScriptConditionsHelper</name><script><![CDATA[// (c) Copyright IBM Corp. 2022. All Rights Reserved.

var SIR_RES_ID = "x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_soar_reference_id";
var INC_RES_ID = "x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id";
var SN_RES_USERNAME = "x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername";

var SN_SI_INCIDENT_TABLE_NAME = "sn_si_incident";
var SN_SI_TASK_TABLE_NAME = "sn_si_task";

/////////////////////////////////////
// Business Rule Condition Helpers //
/////////////////////////////////////

//
//SIR TABLES
//

function isSirTable(current) {
	return !current.isValidField(INC_RES_ID) && current.isValidField(SIR_RES_ID);
}

function isSnSiIncidentTable(current) {
	//Check specifically if this is sn_si_incident table
	return current.getTableName() == SN_SI_INCIDENT_TABLE_NAME;
}

function isSnSiTaskTable(current) {
	//Check specifically if this is sn_si_task table
	return current.getTableName() == SN_SI_TASK_TABLE_NAME;
}

function sirIsLinkedToRes(current) {
	//Check if the current SIR record IS already linked to Resilient
	//Checks first that the table does have INC_RES_ID, guaranteeing it isn't INC table
	return current.getValue(SIR_RES_ID) != null;
}

var ScriptConditionsHelper = Class.create();
ScriptConditionsHelper.prototype = {
	type: 'ScriptConditionsHelper',

	initialize: function() {},

	sirAddCommentCheck: function(current) {
		return isSirTable(current) && sirIsLinkedToRes(current);
	},

	sirAddWorkNoteCheck: function(current) {
		return isSirTable(current) && sirIsLinkedToRes(current);
	},

	sirUpdateStateCheck: function(current) {
		return isSirTable(current) && sirIsLinkedToRes(current);
	},

	sirCreateOnAssignCheck: function(current) {
		var condition = isSirTable(current) && !sirIsLinkedToRes(current) && isSnSiIncidentTable(current);

		var resHelper = new ResilientHelper();
		var checkGroupAllowed = resHelper.assignGroupIsAllowed(current.getDisplayValue("assignment_group").trim().toLowerCase());

		return condition && checkGroupAllowed;
	},

	sitCreateOnAssignCheck: function(current) {
		var condition = isSirTable(current) && !sirIsLinkedToRes(current) && isSnSiTaskTable(current);

		var resHelper = new ResilientHelper();
		var checkGroupAllowed = resHelper.assignGroupIsAllowed(current.getDisplayValue("assignment_group").trim().toLowerCase());

		return condition && checkGroupAllowed;
	}

};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-01 18:58:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>8801379b1b1501103351ca2b234bcb23</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ScriptConditionsHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8801379b1b1501103351ca2b234bcb23</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-02 16:56:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

truef22a8fd7dbf3af008c5d785e0f961946publicCreate an Incident in IBM Resilient from a record in ServiceNowRES_WF_CreateIncidentwf_workflowintegration_developer2019-02-28 21:35:08global/f22a8fd7dbf3af008c5d785e0f9619460RES_WF_CreateIncident13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f96192913db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929wf_workflow_f22a8fd7dbf3af008c5d785e0f961946integration_developer2019-02-28 21:35:08incident
db8c65aec0a8016501d00259bc7203a4false4{}falsefalsefalseadmin2022-01-31 16:09:5022a186831b5545503351ca2b234bcb631admin2022-01-31 16:10:521970-01-01 00:00:002aa142831b5545503351ca2b234bcb4c467301wf_activity22a186831b5545503351ca2b234bcb631sys_variable_valueadmin2022-01-31 16:09:50a6a186831b5545503351ca2b234bcb631admin2022-01-31 16:10:52(function RES_WF_CreateIncident(){ var resHelper, record, snRecordId, caseName, options, resSeverityMap, res, noteText, workNotes, workNotesSplit, severityMapped = null; try { //Instantiate new ResilientHelper resHelper = new ResilientHelper(); //Get the required parameters to create an Incident record = current; snRecordId = record.getValue("number"); caseName = "SN: " + record.getValue("short_description") + " [" + snRecordId + "]"; //Map ServiceNow severity in digits to Resilient strings //TIP: use the 'finfo' command on Resilient Integrations Server //to get Resilient field information resSeverityMap = { "1": "High", "2": "Medium", "3": "Low" }; //SIR tables call severity "business_criticality", //while INC tables call it "severity" //NOTE: the order of this check is important because //the SIR table has a "severity" value that is never used... if (record.getTableName() == "sn_si_incident") { severityMapped = resSeverityMap[record.getValue("business_criticality").toString()]; } else { severityMapped = resSeverityMap[record.getValue("severity").toString()]; } //Initialize options options = { initSnNote: "Incident created in IBM SOAR", optionalFields: { "description": record.getValue("description"), "severity_code": severityMapped } }; // Call helper to create the Incident in Resilient res = resHelper.create(record, snRecordId, caseName, options); if (res) { // Create the initial RES Note noteText = "<br>This " + res.res_reference_type + " has been sent from <b>ServiceNow</b>"; noteText += "<br><b>ServiceNow ID:</b> " + snRecordId; noteText += '<br><b>ServiceNow Link:</b> <a href="'+res.snLink+'">'+res.snLink+'</a></div>'; resHelper.addNote(res.res_reference_id, noteText, "html"); // Get all Work Notes. Returns as a string where each entry is delimited by '\n\n' workNotes = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(-1); //Split the Work Notes on '\n\n' workNotesSplit = workNotes.split("\n\n"); //Loop each Work Note and add a Resilient Note for (var i = 0; i < workNotesSplit.length; i++){ noteText = workNotesSplit[i]; if(noteText && noteText.length > 0){ resHelper.addNote(res.res_reference_id, workNotesSplit[i]); } } } } catch (errMsg) { current.work_notes = "Failed to create an Incident in IBM SOAR.\nReason: " + errMsg; gs.error(errMsg); } })();c35ddef20a0a0ba96248a7090eccd518wf_activity22a186831b5545503351ca2b234bcb631sys_variable_valueadmin2022-01-31 16:09:50a6a186831b5545503351ca2b234bcb631admin2022-01-31 16:10:52(function RES_WF_CreateIncident(){ var resHelper, record, snRecordId, caseName, options, resSeverityMap, res, noteText, workNotes, workNotesSplit, severityMapped = null; try { //Instantiate new ResilientHelper resHelper = new ResilientHelper(); //Get the required parameters to create an Incident record = current; snRecordId = record.getValue("number"); caseName = "SN: " + record.getValue("short_description") + " [" + snRecordId + "]"; //Map ServiceNow severity in digits to Resilient strings //TIP: use the 'finfo' command on Resilient Integrations Server //to get Resilient field information resSeverityMap = { "1": "High", "2": "Medium", "3": "Low" }; //SIR tables call severity "business_criticality", //while INC tables call it "severity" //NOTE: the order of this check is important because //the SIR table has a "severity" value that is never used... if (record.getTableName() == "sn_si_incident") { severityMapped = resSeverityMap[record.getValue("business_criticality").toString()]; } else { severityMapped = resSeverityMap[record.getValue("severity").toString()]; } //Initialize options options = { initSnNote: "Incident created in IBM SOAR", optionalFields: { "description": record.getValue("description"), "severity_code": severityMapped } }; // Call helper to create the Incident in Resilient res = resHelper.create(record, snRecordId, caseName, options); if (res) { // Create the initial RES Note noteText = "<br>This " + res.res_reference_type + " has been sent from <b>ServiceNow</b>"; noteText += "<br><b>ServiceNow ID:</b> " + snRecordId; noteText += '<br><b>ServiceNow Link:</b> <a href="'+res.snLink+'">'+res.snLink+'</a></div>'; resHelper.addNote(res.res_reference_id, noteText, "html"); // Get all Work Notes. Returns as a string where each entry is delimited by '\n\n' workNotes = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(-1); //Split the Work Notes on '\n\n' workNotesSplit = workNotes.split("\n\n"); //Loop each Work Note and add a Resilient Note for (var i = 0; i < workNotesSplit.length; i++){ noteText = workNotesSplit[i]; if(noteText && noteText.length > 0){ resHelper.addNote(res.res_reference_id, workNotesSplit[i]); } } } } catch (errMsg) { current.work_notes = "Failed to create an Incident in IBM SOAR.\nReason: " + errMsg; gs.error(errMsg); } })();c35ddef20a0a0ba96248a7090eccd51822a186831b5545503351ca2b234bcb63truestandardfalsefalsefalsetrueAlways0falseadmin2022-01-31 16:09:502ea186831b5545503351ca2b234bcb630admin2022-01-31 sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_92ad00c11b89c1103351ca2b234bcb65
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition>gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName() && gs.getUserName() != "system" && (new ScriptConditionsHelper().sirAddCommentCheck(current) == true)</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="task">commentsVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>[SIR] Add Comment to Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions>x_ibmrt_resilient.user</role_conditions><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {
	
	var workflowId = null;
	
	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)	
	var wf = new global.Workflow();

	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_AddComment");
	
	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(workflowId == null){
		workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_AddComment");
	}
	
	//Start the workflow, where 'current' is the current record the UI action was triggered from
	wf.startFlow(workflowId, current, null, null);

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-12 16:20:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>92ad00c11b89c1103351ca2b234bcb65</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[SIR] Add Comment to Resilient</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_92ad00c11b89c1103351ca2b234bcb65</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-02 16:39:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=92ad00c11b89c1103351ca2b234bcb65"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_662790551bddcd103351ca2b234bcbc8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_attachment</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Send Attachment to Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {

	var snowRestHelper = new SNOWRESTHelper();
	var resHelper = new ResilientHelper();

	var tableName = current.getValue("table_name");
	var attachSysId = current.getValue("sys_id");

	//Make sure that the table with the attachment is in the allowed list
	//because this rule is run on the sys_attach table (where the attachment lives)
	//so it should only be executed beyond this point if the table the attachment
	//is linked to is in the allowed list
	if (snowRestHelper.tableIsAllowed(tableName)) {

		//Create a GlideSysAttachment obj to read the content of the attachment in question
		var attachment = new GlideSysAttachment();

		//Get a readable GlideTextReader object from the content stream
		//which will be iterated and combined in the resHelper method
		var contentStream = attachment.getContentStream(attachSysId);
		//Get the content type (i.e. "pdf")
		var contentType = current.getValue("content_type");
		//Get the file's name
		var fileName = current.getValue("file_name");

		//Need to get the value from the associated table entry to grab the
		//x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id value for the resReferenceId
		var tableRecord = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		tableRecord.get(current.getValue("table_sys_id"));
		var resReferenceId = tableRecord.getValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id");


		//Call the method to process the attachment data and call the API endpoint
		//to upload the attachment to Resilient
		resHelper.addAttachment(resReferenceId, contentStream, fileName, contentType);
	}

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-25 21:57:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>662790551bddcd103351ca2b234bcbc8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Send Attachment to Resilient</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Resilient" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_662790551bddcd103351ca2b234bcbc8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-25 22:00:31</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=662790551bddcd103351ca2b234bcbc8"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_450903e3db3b6f009106f4331f961927
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.isValidField("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") && current.getValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") != null && gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">incident_stateVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="incident_state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>[INC] Update State in Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions>x_ibmrt_resilient.user</role_conditions><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {
	
	var workflowId = null;
	
	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)
	var wf = new global.Workflow();
	
	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_UpdateState");
	
	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(workflowId == null){
		workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_UpdateState");
	}

	//Start the workflow, where 'current' is the current record the UI action was triggered from
	wf.startFlow(workflowId, current, null, null);

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>integration_developer</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-01 16:10:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>450903e3db3b6f009106f4331f961927</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[INC] Update State in Resilient</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_450903e3db3b6f009106f4331f961927</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-14 18:35:29</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=450903e3db3b6f009106f4331f961927"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ed9632dbdbb3af008c5d785e0f961942
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_ibmrt_resilient.CreateTask</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Class that is called from the Create Resilient Task UI Action to create a Task in IBM Resilient</description><name>CreateTask</name><script><![CDATA[// (c) Copyright IBM Corp. 2019. All Rights Reserved.

var CreateTask = Class.create();
CreateTask.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: "CreateTask",
	
	createTask: function(){
		
		var snTableName, recordSysId, incidentId, record, wfVars, wfId, wf = null;
		
		//Get parameters from Ajax Client call
		snTableName = this.getParameter("sysparm_snTableName");
		recordSysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_recordSysId");
		incidentId = this.getParameter("sysparm_incidentId");
		
		//Get the GlideRecord using Table Name and sys_id
		record = new GlideRecord(snTableName);
		record.addQuery("sys_id", recordSysId);
		record.query();
		record.next();
					
		//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)
		wf = new global.Workflow();

		//Set workflow variable
		wfVars = { 
			"u_ibm_resilient_incident_id": incidentId 
		};

		//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
		wfId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_CreateTask");

		//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
		if(wfId == null){
			wfId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_CreateTask");
		}

		//Start the workflow
		wf.startFlow(wfId, record, null, wfVars);
	}
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>integration_developer</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-28 20:11:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>ed9632dbdbb3af008c5d785e0f961942</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CreateTask</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ed9632dbdbb3af008c5d785e0f961942</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>integration_developer</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-28 20:11:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_b4cf19b91b9941503351ca2b234bcb34
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri>/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/api/multipart_helper</default_operation_uri><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>multipart_helper</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var boundaryValue = request.queryParams.boundary_id;
	var attachmentID = request.queryParams.attachment_id;
	var formName = request.queryParams.form_name;
	var fileName = request.queryParams.file_name;
	var contentType = request.queryParams.content_type;
		
	response.setContentType("multipart/form-data");

	// Retrieve the attachment that needs to be multiparterized.
	var attachmentGR = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
	attachmentGR.get(attachmentID);

	if( attachmentGR ) {
		// Gets the response's StreamWriter.
		var writer = response.getStreamWriter();

		// write the initial boundary to the stream.
		writer.writeString("--" + boundaryValue + "\r\n");

		// set the metadata for this data part. (we only support one attachment currently)
		writer.writeString('Content-Disposition: form-data; name="' + formName + '"; filename="' + fileName + '"\r\n');

		// set the content type for this part of the datastream
		writer.writeString('Content-Type: ' + contentType +'\r\n');
		writer.writeString('\r\n');

		gs.info("*** here 1");
		// get the input stream for the sys attachment & stream the file into the datastream
		var inputStream = new GlideSysAttachment().getContentStream( attachmentID );
		writer.writeStream(inputStream);

		// finalize the payload by ending the boundary
		writer.writeString("\r\n--" + boundaryValue + "--\r\n");
		gs.info("*** here2");

		response.setStatus(200);
	} else {
		return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError("Error on creating temporary attachment for Upload Attachment to Resilient");
	}

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_ibmrt_resilient/v1/api/multipart_helper</operation_uri><produces>application/json,multipart/form-data</produces><produces_customized>true</produces_customized><relative_path>/multipart_helper</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-27 16:42:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>b4cf19b91b9941503351ca2b234bcb34</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>multipart_helper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_b4cf19b91b9941503351ca2b234bcb34</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-28 16:22:39</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="api">4858b21fdbb3af008c5d785e0f9619fa</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">6688761fdbb3af008c5d785e0f961926</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_6fe39fb61b8d09103351ca2b234bcb50
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition>gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName() && gs.getUserName() != "system" && (new ScriptConditionsHelper().sitCreateOnAssignCheck(current)) == true</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="task">assignment_groupANYTHING^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ANYTHING" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>[SIT] Create Task for Assignment Group</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {

	var resReferenceId, wfVars, wfId, wf, resHelper, snowHelper = null;

	resHelper = new ResilientHelper();
	snowHelper = new SNOWRESTHelper();

	//Get the res ID to properly link this new task to a resilient incident
	resReferenceId = snowHelper.getResReferenceIdFromTaskParent(current, "sn_si_incident");

	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)
	wf = new global.Workflow();

	//Set workflow variable
	wfVars = { 
		"u_ibm_resilient_incident_id": resHelper.parseRefId(resReferenceId).incidentId
	};

	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	wfId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_CreateTask");

	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(wfId == null){
		wfId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_CreateTask");
	}

	//Start the workflow
	wf.startFlow(wfId, current, null, wfVars);

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-18 17:25:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6fe39fb61b8d09103351ca2b234bcb50</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[SIT] Create Task for Assignment Group</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Security QRadar SOAR">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6fe39fb61b8d09103351ca2b234bcb50</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-09 20:15:30</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6fe39fb61b8d09103351ca2b234bcb50"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_5fda3c531bcd49103351ca2b234bcbf5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sm_task</collection><condition>current.isValidField("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") && current.getValue("x_ibmrt_resilient_ibm_resilient_reference_id") != null && gs.getProperty("x_ibmrt_resilient.ServiceNowUsername") != gs.getUserName()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sm_task">stateVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>[SIT] Update State in Resilient</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current) {
	
	var workflowId = null;
	
	//Instantiate new Workflow object (use global. as in Scoped Application)
	var wf = new global.Workflow();
	
	//Check if user has defined a custom workflow
	workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("CUSTOM_RES_WF_UpdateState");
	
	//If there is no custom workflow, run the default one
	if(workflowId == null){
		workflowId = wf.getWorkflowFromName("RES_WF_UpdateState");
	}

	//Start the workflow, where 'current' is the current record the UI action was triggered from
	wf.startFlow(workflowId, current, null, null);

})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-19 19:24:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5fda3c531bcd49103351ca2b234bcbf5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[SIT] Update State in Resilient</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IBM Resilient" source="x_ibmrt_resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IBM Resilient">13db855fdbfb2f009106f4331f961929</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5fda3c531bcd49103351ca2b234bcbf5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 13:23:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5fda3c531bcd49103351ca2b234bcbf5"/></record_update>
